content: अवन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अव्-ल्युट्] Protecting, defending; अनवनी नवनीपवनावलिः <ls>Śi. 6. 37.</ls> --नं Protection &c.

अवनं [अव्-ल्युट्] {@--1@} Protection, defence; भुजोऽनवने <ls>P. I. 3. 66</ls>, <ls>Nalod. 1. 4.</ls> {@--2@} Gratifying, pleasing. {@--3@} Wish desire. {@--4@} Delight, satisfaction. {@--5@} Hurry, speed.
